title: This assignment tests you to how to take inputs from command prompt.

questionText.text:
Create a program using Scanner Object to take inputs from command prompt:
Given String s, print all the substrings of the string in given format.
Input : BSIT
Output:
[“B”, “BS”, “BSI”, “BSIT”]
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
